channel.title: Paintball guns
channel.description: I have a 98 custom with a double trigger. An e-trigger costs $100 while a response trigger costs $70. A brand new [url=http://www.amazon.com/Tippmann-Gryphon-Basic-Paintball-Marker/dp/B004AE6EHK/ref=sr_1_1?ie=UTF8&qid=1337995409&sr=8-1]tippmann gryphon[/url] costs $70. My brother just purchased one and its a very nice gun. Now comes the [url=http://www.rap4.com/store/paintball/rap4-tornado-with-electronic-trigger]RAP4 Tornado[/url] with an e-trigger and a 11-bps hopper for $50 brand new. My friend has this gun and his was used and in shit condition. Otherwise the gun is very nice. Shoots fast and hard. Has 3-round burst, semi-auto, and full auto options for shooting. I'm not sure which one to buy...
